Battery.BATTERY LIFE (CONTINUOUS COMMUNICATION T: Max. 9 hours (NC ON), Max. 10 hours (Ambient Sound Mode), Max. 13 hours (NC OFF)

Battery.Battery Charge Time: Approx. 3.5 hours, This unit can be used for 80 minutes after 10 minutes of charging.

Battery.Battery Life (Waiting Time): Max. 11 hours (NC ON), Max. 13 hours (Ambient Sound Mode), Max. 100 hours (NC OFF)

Battery.Battery Life (continuous music playback: Max. 10 hours (NC ON), Max. 12 hours (Ambient Sound Mode), Max. 15 hours (NC OFF)

Bluetooth\u00ae Specification.Effective Range: Line of sight approx. 30 ft (10 m)

General Features.Frequency Response (Active Operation): 20 Hz–20,000 Hz (44.1 kHz Sampling)/20 Hz–40,000 Hz (LDAC 96 kHz Sampling, 990 kbps)

General Features.Frequency Response (Bluetooth\u00ae Comm: 20 Hz–20,000 Hz (44.1 kHz Sampling)/20 Hz–40,000 Hz (LDAC 96 kHz Sampling, 990 kbps)

General Features.Impedance (Ohm): 50 ohm (1 kHz) (when connecting via the headphone cable with the unit turned on), 17 ohm (1kHz) (when connecting via the headphone cable with the unit turned off)

General Features.Sensitivities (dB/mW): 99 dB/mW (when connecting via the headphone cable with the unit turned on), 94 dB/mW (when connecting via the headphone cable with the unit turned off)
